Enumeration Type Documentation

enum wapi_bitrate_flag_t

Bitrate flags.

At the moment, unicast (IW_BITRATE_UNICAST) and broadcast (IW_BITRATE_BROADCAST) bitrate flags are not supported.

Enumerator:
WAPI_BITRATE_AUTO 
WAPI_BITRATE_FIXED
